__e: I give him shit for being such a terrible cook.
This man is the murdered man's cook who disappeared on the night of the crime.
We don't have to order, I just ask one of the cooks in the back to... make us all a bunch of stuff.
Alone, yes, completely alone, with two maids, a cook, and a nurse who comes daily.
And this is what I do, I'm a cook. And this is like the greatest meal I have ever had in my life.
I haven't actually read your book... but you can't tell me that survival isn't easier for people... who are born with a private chef and health insurance.
"Yeah, my cook's actually a pretty good guy." You know?
CHEF IS ALIVE BUT HE CAN NOT TALK TO YOU
Maybe the passing of Cook was a blessing in disguise.
